Package index

publication context

Create plots, display text, and highlight source code with uniform results across publishing contexts.

sure_plot()
Create uniform plots across publishing contexts
pubcontext()
Provide client code for various contexts
with_grdev()
Execute a code block in a graphics context.
prep_articles()
Prepare notebooks for downstream processing

publication pipeline

pub_ipynb_to_rmd()
convert jupyter notebooks to knitr-ready rmarkdown
pub_rmd_to_rmd()
rewrite an rmarkdown file injecting a new header
pub_rmd_to_md()
knit an rmarkdown file into a markdown file

wrapped cli functions

cli_app_factory()
Create the default CLI app object
cli_metayer_handler()
Handle CLI messages
cli_nullity_handler()
Let cli methods replace NULL values with sensible substitutions

wrapped cli functions

miscellaneous utilities

config_get()
A variation of config::get that can utilize backreferences
mty_uuid()
Get a uuid
rm.all()
Utility function that resets the global environment.

Recursively update a list

metaprogramming

easier metaprogramming and safer monkey patching

wrapped_factory()
Construct a wrapped function
wrapped_with_logger()
Wrap a function for logging
remap_symb()
Remap symbols in a list
with_monkey_patch()
Temporarily monkey patch a namespaced method

testing functions

test_filter()
A less motivational test
test_mty_uuid()
Create a predictable identifier sequence

Basic test sanitation

A mocked log_level factory
